title: Teacher Mathematics Knowledge Development Project through Curriculum Material Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary mathematics concepts and experience interpreting curriculum materials
context.additional_context: A weekend-intensive education program for office/administrative working learners, requiring guaranteed access to smartphone-based materials

learning_goals: Identify and explain five foundational mathematical ideas in curriculum materials
Analyze the connection between mathematical representations and ideas to apply them to instructional design
Evaluate problem complexity levels and design activity sequences appropriate to learning stages
Create learning path maps and improve them by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
